duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop integration policies and initiatives for Teams 365 implementation.
Collaborate with project teams to align projects with mission goals.
Manage the use of Teams 365 for mission goals.
Design, plan, and manage long-term mission goals with IT and project leads.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems Management or related field, OR an Associate’s degree plus 7 years of recent specialized experience, OR eleven (11) total years of recent specialized experience.
Microsoft Certified IT Professional or Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE)
